workzen.xgen.model.website
Class Site

java.lang.Object
  workzen.xgen.model.website.Site

public class Site
extends java.lang.Object

The site stores pages, and each page has a menuitem. The site maps the pages by name. A TreeModel is also loaded for convience.
The top level xml definition is a <website> Subelements include <menu> and <menuitem> elements, however, these elements are all modeled as menuitems.
Each menuitem can contain other menuitems, forming a tree.

Author:
Brad.Matlack

getRelativeHrefFIXME

public java.lang.String getRelativeHrefFIXME(MenuItem item)
Getting the relative path is much more complex. Just stripping off the parent path will not work. Navigation on a level with subdirectories is different that navigation on a level with files. This method must be able to navigate backwards (../path).
